text:
The Best Songs of 2022 So Far

Every product on this page was chosen by a Harper's BAZAAR editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.

Getty Images Getty Images From Diane Kruger and Norman Reedus' red carpet debut to joint nominees Alison Brie and Dave Franco, these are the cutest couple moments of the Golden Globes 2018 red carpet. View Gallery 25 Photos Getty Images 1 of 25 Alexi Ashe & Seth Meyers Getty Images 2 of 25 Alison Brie & Dave Franco Getty Images Getty Images 3 of 25 Oprah Winfrey & Stedman Graham Getty Images 4 of 25 Deborra Lee Furness & Hugh Jackman Getty Images 5 of 25 Alvina Stewart & Anthony Anderson Getty Images 6 of 25 Elizabeth Chambers & Armie Hammer Getty Images 7 of 25 Brittany Lopez & Christian Slater Getty Images 8 of 25 Emma Thomas & Christopher Nolan Getty Images 9 of 25 Michelle Pfeiffer & David E.
